mn.body:
<node name="${1:node_name}" channel="${2:channel}" format="${3:category}/${4:method}" model="${5:model}">
		<node name="${6:sub_node_name}" channel="${7:sub_channel}" format="${8:category}/${9:method}" model="${10:sub_model}" />
</node>
mn.description: Create Node with Sub Node and Attributes
